name: .JGCSCS File Extension
type_name: EditPad Custom Syntax Coloring Scheme File
summary: Learn about .JGCSCS files and view a list of programs that open them.

description: File used by EditPad, a text and source code editor for Windows; saves information that allows the editor to support syntax highlighting for a particular language, such as HTML, PHP, Perl, or SQL; should be copied to the same directory as the EditPadPro.exe file to be installed.

content: You can access syntax coloring settings by choosing Options â†’ Configure File Types and selecting the "Colors and Syntax" tab. Click the Refresh button in this window after installing new JGCSCS files.

windows.name: Open over 400 file formats with File Viewer Plus.Free Download
